statements: UPDATE cached_data SET data = '{"name": "Alice", "age": 30}', last_updated = '2022-01-15' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE cached_data SET last_updated = '2022-04-20', data = '{"name": "Bob", "age": 25}' WHERE id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE cached_data SET data = '{"name": "John Doe", "age": 30}', last_updated = NOW() WHERE id = 'abc123'
UPDATE cached_data SET last_updated = NOW(), data = '{"name": "Alice Smith", "age": 25}' WHERE id = 'xyz789'
UPDATE website_users SET username='john_doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE cached_data SET data_value='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet', expiration_date='2022-12-31' WHERE cache_id=3;

UPDATE cached_data SET data_value='updated value', expiration_date='2022-12-31' WHERE cache_id=2
UPDATE cache_table SET cache_value = 'new value' WHERE cache_key = 'key1';

UPDATE cache_table SET cache_value = 'New Cache Value' WHERE cache_key = 'example_key';
UPDATE user_table SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 5;
